configure.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! =============================================
00002 !
00003 !                CONFIGURE
00004 !
00005 !  Sets up physical system: particle positions, velocities
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine configure
00010 
00011   use physvars
00012   !  use utils
00013   implicit none
00014   include 'mpif.h'
00015 
00016   integer :: i, ipe, idummy=0, ierr, ifile
00017   real :: t_walk, t_walkc, t_force
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021   config: select case(system_config)
00022 
00023   case(1)              ! Set up particles according to geometry
00024      call randion         
00025 
00026 
00027      if (vte > 0) then
00028         call maxwell1(ux,nppm,1,nep,vte)
00029         call maxwell1(uy,nppm,1,nep,vte)
00030         call maxwell1(uz,nppm,1,nep,vte)
00031         call scramble_v(1,nep)   ! remove x,y,z correlations
00032      else
00033         call cold_start(1,nep)
00034      endif
00035 
00036      if (vti > 0) then
00037         call maxwell1(ux,nppm,nep+1,nip,vti)
00038         call maxwell1(uy,nppm,nep+1,nip,vti)
00039         call maxwell1(uz,nppm,nep+1,nip,vti)
00040         call scramble_v(nep+1,nip) ! remove x,y,z correlations
00041      else
00042         call cold_start(nep+1,nip)
00043      endif
00044 
00045   case(2)
00046      call special_start(ispecial)
00047 
00048   case default     ! Default = 0 - no plasma target
00049      if (my_rank==0) write (6,*) 'Warning: no particles set up'
00050      npart_total=0
00051      npp = 0
00052   end select config
00053 
00054 
00055 end subroutine configure
00056
